name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the "Minnan Wolf Reversal" incident broke out, almost all Taiwanese Internet celebrities on Douyin in China have become the target of doubts from netizens.
Among them, "Mai Gou 886" even released several clarification videos in one day. Netizens said: "Dog brother is obviously panicking"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens sent private messages to the Farmers' Daily, asking whether it really thought about farmers?
Some netizens were blocked by the Farmers' Daily for this reason.
Currently, the Farmers' Daily has enabled the "only allow fans to comment" function.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 3 (Released) Inner Mongolia. Late at night, senior high school students were still studying. One student slumped on the floor, staring at the ceiling in a daze.
December 2, Hefei, Anhui. At 12:30 in the morning, the child hadn't finished his homework yet, and he broke down crying anxiously. His mother comforted him: 'Hurry up, it's okay if you don't finish it.'
Netizens replied: Only by letting go of yourself can you get ashore.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Going home"
On December 8, with the fall of the Assad regime, thousands of Syrian refugees are returning to their homeland.
This caused congestion on the border between Türkiye and Syria.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a Kremlin source, Assad and his family have arrived in Moscow, and Russia has provided them with asylum for humanitarian reasons, according to Russia's TASS news agency.
"Russia has always advocated a political solution to the Syrian crisis. We insist on resuming UN-mediated negotiations," the source said.
"Russian officials are in contact with representatives of the Syrian armed opposition, and the opposition leaders have guaranteed the security of Russia's military bases and diplomatic missions on Syrian territory," the source added.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
December 7, Guangzhou. A suicide note suspected to be from a civil servant
The letter said that he used to have great faith that the Party would lead him to a good life. But he was completely disillusioned during the epidemic. Now at the end of the year, he is still owed half a year's salary, and he is getting more and more scared. He has worked hard for a long time. He studied hard for the college entrance examination in order to live a good life, but now he still has nothing. Is such a future worth looking forward to? Is there still a future in life?
In the end, he said, "Xi Jinping, listen to me, this life is lost in your tyranny, and my blood is stained in your hands, Xi Jinping."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 8, Guangzhou Metro suddenly strengthened security checks, adopting stricter security checks than airports. After passing the metal detector, you have to manually scan and recheck. Each person is checked, and power banks with more than 20,000 mAh are not allowed. Tissues must also be taken out for inspection.
Because the incident happened suddenly, there were long queues in the subway station. At some stations, the queues waiting for security checks were even as long as 100 meters. Some people waited for more than half an hour before getting on the subway.
There were people outside the station, but only a few people in the carriage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 8, Nan Fang Daily published an article saying that Guangzhou Metro will implement stricter security checks, reminding everyone to reserve extra time. Since the reminder was issued late last night, it may indicate that this enhanced security check mode will become normalized.
Some netizens commented: Terrorists now don’t have to worry about how to pass the security check, and the people queuing at the door are better targets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, a single mother posted a video saying that she is 37 years old and has no relatives. Now her child is sick, so she can't go to work and has to take care of the child at home. She has no other choice because of the pressure of life. "If you want to sleep with me, call me and give me some money."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 8, Hebei. An employee of the State Power Investment Corporation posted a video saying that he was unfairly punished by the party organization of his unit, and the upper level refused to accept his legitimate appeal. He was suppressed and lost his job because of this, so he decided to quit the party organization.
Netizens congratulated him in the comment area for abandoning the dark and joining the light: "Welcome to return to the people's team"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangzhou Metro still strengthens security checks on working days today, long queues
Some netizens said before that the security check is related to the Guangzhou Marathon, but the Guangzhou Marathon ended yesterday, and the subway is still strengthening security checks today.
Some netizens said that it was because the provincial department sent people to conduct unannounced security checks with knives, and no knives were found at the Guangzhou-Huozhou subway station.
A Guangzhou Metro security inspector complained that now if a bag is missed, 300 yuan of salary will be deducted, which is equivalent to working for two days in vain, and the security inspection company will also be fined.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, CCTV 4, the Chinese International Channel of China Central Television, misspelled the English word BREAKING in the opening credits of a breaking news program.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Recently, a woman with a baby was trapped in life and recorded a video in front of her child to receive customers.
According to the woman: She is 37 years old this year, her child is sick and needs someone to take care of him, and she can't afford to send him to a nursery, so she can't work. The child has no father, and the woman has no relatives, so she can only receive customers. The woman cried halfway through the video.
Some netizens made a joke as shown in Figure 2, hoping that the woman can get help from Peng Liyuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Raghid Al-Tatari, a former Syrian Air Force pilot, was sentenced to prison in 1981 after he refused to bomb Hama. He was released from Saydnaya prison on the 8th after 43 years in prison. He was 27 when he was imprisoned and is now 70.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: All the songs of the former Taiwanese patriotic musician Minnan Wolf who defected recently have been removed from all Chinese platforms

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, economist Fu Peng mentioned in an offline private meeting of HSBC: At that time, the first thing leaders did when they went down to visit was to lift the lid of the pot at home and pay attention to your eating situation. But after the reform and opening up, if eating has become a problem, then it is a big problem.
"In the end, who is the one who misled the country and the people, history will have a correct evaluation"
At present, this speech of Fu Peng is being deleted by various Chinese platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen posted that four students from Tengzhou Experimental Senior High School committed suicide by jumping off a building within four days. The netizen also said that the school teacher insulted the body of a deceased student, kicked the body and said: "Don't pretend to be dead, it's really unlucky."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 6, the media reported that an American man named Jack had been practicing martial arts in Wudang Mountain for 14 years, and his blond hair turned black. Jack responded: It might be caused by the living environment and the food he ate.
The report triggered doubts from netizens, who replied: Can practicing Chinese martial arts change genes?
“Haha, I ate genetically modified food”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the founder of Kunlun Nest released a video saying that he had successfully imported 200 pieces of Nvidia's latest and most advanced H200 computing cards, which are the core productivity in the field of artificial intelligence. It is reported that since October 23, the US Department of Commerce has begun to block high-end AI computing power from China. Graphics cards above the 4090 level (including H100) have been included in the list of prohibited sales to China. Searching Taobao found that you can now buy the uncut version of the 4090 or even the H100 professional graphics card.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Henan Village Bank depositor bought a new kitchen knife online because his previous kitchen knife was damaged. The police immediately came to his door.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
SARFT: Investigate and clean up AI modified videos, "desecrate classic IPs without boundaries for traffic" and require individual provinces to report the investigation and feedback on December 10.
Netizens responded: "How can the problem of spam software ads on the elderly's mobile phones not be solved?" "Why didn't you say anything about opening a supermarket on the Long March"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
CCTV exposed the Chinese Stomatological Association, and you can become a member by paying money
Some hospitals advertised that they were members of the "Oral Disease Diagnosis and Treatment Specialty Alliance" and hung posters of the chief physician of Union Hospital. However, the doctor's qualifications and practice information were inconsistent with the public announcements
The most commonly used identities are members of the Chinese Stomatological Association and members of various professional committees. Reporters entered the official website of the Chinese Stomatological Association and registered using a pseudonym without providing a certificate
And, just by paying a fee, you can also obtain a qualification certificate for professional committee members.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution December 7th Guangdong Yangjiang Angel Maternity Hospital owed wages, and employees collectively jumped off the building to demand their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: Migrant workers hold banners to demand wages at the gate of Hunan First Normal University
It is reported that the school is Mao Zedong's alma mater, and Xi Jinping visited it in March this year

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 8, Tangshan, Hebei. A village party secretary responded to "Bai Yansong said that ordinary people dare not spend money" 
The village party secretary said that official data showed that there were as many as 900 million people with a monthly income of less than 2,000 yuan. In addition, ordinary people have to bear the burden of education, medical care, buying houses, and elderly care. The government does not have a solid security system to cover the bottom line. With the little savings on hand, who dares to squander it?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 8th Shanghai Yujiangting homeowners defended their rights. The security guard pointed at the homeowners in front of the police and shouted: "Kick all the owners inside"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 3rd Qingdao real estate agencies banded together to write a joint letter to fight against 58.com, Anjuke and other platforms
Because of the sluggish real estate market, 58.com and Anjuke and other platforms still raised their service fees and tilted their traffic towards the platform's own stores. Qingdao local real estate agencies brought out the central government's policy to promote the real estate market, banded together to write a joint letter to fight against the traffic platforms.
Real estate agencies united to form the Qingdao Real Estate Brokerage Industry Alliance and put forward five major demands.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In an exclusive interview on the 8th, the President-elect of the United States, Trump, said that efforts will be made to deport illegal immigrants. For families where some family members are illegal and other family members are legally residing in the United States, all family members may be deported.
Cancel "birthright citizenship" Children born in the United States by illegal immigrants will no longer automatically obtain U.S. citizenship.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The wife of the criminal police captain of the Lubei Branch of the Tangshan Public Security Bureau reported her husband Sun Jianyong by real name.
The woman said: Her husband had colluded with criminals to fabricate facts, tamper with criminal cases, cover up crimes, and use his position to coordinate for criminal suspects not to pursue criminal responsibility. He colluded with others to defraud state-owned property and collected millions of yuan in coordination fees in just one time. He drove a seized vehicle without a license plate, drove drunk and hit someone and fled.
Her husband also had two illegitimate children outside of marriage, and threatened and insulted his wife over the phone for a long time. He also abused his wife and children for a long time.
The woman's account has disappeared on Douyin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, a blogger said that he posted a photo of Bashar al-Assad wearing old leather shoes on Weibo, but it was deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Syrian Embassy in Moscow raised a new Syrian flag.
Diplomats chanted "Free Syria".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the incident of "a female master's degree holder missing for more than ten years and having a pair of children" has attracted attention.
The niece of the "taken in" Zhang Mou responded to netizens' questions through a live broadcast: "Huahua (a female master's degree holder) also has moments of clarity. Why can't she leave when she is clear-headed? Why is she unemployed at the age of 31? Because she is a person who is useless to society and the country! Which unit would employ a mentally ill patient? If it weren't for my second uncle taking her in, she wouldn't know whether she is dead or alive now!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 8, Guangdong. A female delivery driver broke down while delivering food, and screamed heartbreakingly in the middle of a busy road.
Insider: The female rider was complained about for overtime, and her electric bike was finally confiscated by the traffic police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 5, Guangdong. An entrepreneur posted a video saying that if it is easy for foreign capital to come in, but it takes a lot of effort to go out, who would be willing to come in?
The isolation of foreign capital in China will lead to an internal cycle, and if the internal cycle continues to develop, it will become a planned economy and a closed-door policy.
If any country does not participate in isolation from the world, then the economy of this country will definitely fall off a cliff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 6, Huang Xiaonan (transliteration), a 22-year-old Chinese man who was studying at a university in Singapore, was charged with illegally detaining a 15-year-old girl on November 24. If convicted, he could be sentenced to up to seven years in prison and a fine.
Deputy Public Prosecutor Amira said: It is not recommended to allow the defendant to be released on bail

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on December 9, after the United States announced a new round of semiconductor export controls on China, China today accused Nvidia of suspected violations of antitrust laws and launched an investigation into it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 9, Hezhou, Guangxi. A large-scale fight broke out between two villages in Fengxiang Town, Zhongshan County, suspected of fighting over land.
In the video, the villagers uniformly wore helmets, held steel pipes, and threw bricks at each other. In another video, helmeted police followed the villagers, and the ground was full of broken stones and bricks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/vH1fFim1fI

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Villagers from both sides threw bricks at each other in front of the police car

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 9, Japanese media reported that a 46-year-old Chinese woman stole 45 cabbages from a field in Iwata City, Shizuoka Prefecture.
The police later found the woman, but she denied the accusation, saying: I saw that these vegetables were rotten and thrown away, so I picked them up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, under a video that said "The Assad government, with a 97.29% approval rating, is finished," thousands of netizens collectively wished for "good luck."
